resources.string: Leaf spots are brown in color, circular and enlarge to about the size of a nickel. Concentric rings can be seen within the spots and these may coalesce forming irregular areas on the foliage. Disease severity is positively correlated with cloudy, wet weather. The disease occurs primarily on mature leaves often beginning on the lower leaves and progressing to other leaves higher up on the stalk.

Leaf spots are brown in color, circular and enlarge to about the size of a nickel. Concentric rings can be seen within the spots and these may coalesce forming irregular areas on the foliage. Disease severity is positively correlated with cloudy, wet weather. The disease occurs primarily on mature leaves often beginning on the lower leaves and progressing to other leaves higher up on the stalk.
Do you need expert help on your tobacco disease problem? Contact the experts below and get insight on what you can do.

You can also reach this expert by sending a message with a picture of your tobacco leaf disease.

This app was developed specially to help tobacco farmers improve their yields by giving them a tool to assist in the management of leaf diseases on their tobacco plants. This app uses Artificial Intelligence to recognize tobacco leaf diseases.

This app serves as a capstone project of Clarita Batalia, Norlex Jr. Galam Pascua, Ryan Pascua Villarba.

 System adviser - Paulo Opiña Jr
 Subject adviser - Rose Mary A. Velasco
 Lead panel- Reynaldo R. Corpuz
 Panel member - Christopher Guiang , Paulo Opiña Jr
 Dean - Betchie E. Aguinaldo

 Isabela State University
 Cauayan City campus
 S.Y. 2022 - 2023

Imeplemented at Cauayan City Isabela
Take a photo of the leaf disease

The National Tobacco Administration (NTA) was created through Executive Order (EO) 245 issued by then President Corazon C. Aquino on July 24, 1987. It has become the sole government body that oversees and regulates the growth and development of the industry, and to look after the welfare of marginalized farmers.
The image you captured was not recognized by the application. Try to capture an image of the tobacco leaf disease again. Focus the camera on the leaf disease and make sure the image is clear.
